ygData.subject: [eqbards] Scary Gathering rumors!
ygData.msgSnippet: I snipped this from a person on the Tunare boards that went to the EQ gathering, while not final or anything, it did strike a little fear in me :
ygData.messageBody:
I snipped this from a person on the Tunare boards that went to the EQ
gathering, while not final or anything, it did strike a little fear in me :



<Levels: Present theory is that the limit is 60th. Every level after 50 is a
"Hell
level." Caster types get a spell at *each* level after 50. They wouldn't
spoil
what the new melee skills are (a cynic might think, they haven't thought
of it
yet?). Bard spells, the holes will be filled in the current spell list
(the missing
levels) and they should get a song every other level in Ruins>

The first part to the second quote is pretty common knowledge by now , but
that last part is pretty scary. If that rumor is true , or songs better rock
some serious butt , or whats the point? I can still group with lvl 60's at
51. Pretty scary stuff , oh well , there is still a good bit of time before
the expansion. We can only hope.....

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 50 bard of Tunare
